title: Gentle Grounding & Breath Flow
goal: To calm the nervous system and ease stress for PCOS women through simple poses and guided breathing.

steps.title: Easy Pose (Sukhasana)
steps.instructions: Sit cross-legged on the floor or on a cushion. Keep your spine straight, shoulders relaxed, and hands resting on knees, palms down.

steps.title: Centered Breath
steps.instructions: Inhale slowly through the nose for 4 counts, then exhale gently for 6 counts. Repeat for 6 rounds.

steps.title: Seated Spinal Flex (Modified Cat-Cow)
steps.instructions: While seated, inhale and arch your back slightly, lifting the chest. Exhale and round your spine, tucking chin toward chest. Repeat with breath.

steps.title: Heart-Opening Breath
steps.instructions: Breathe in deeply through the nose, expanding the chest. Breathe out through the mouth, releasing stress. Repeat slowly for 5 rounds.

title: Relax & Release with Mindful Movement
goal: To release physical tension in hips and back, reduce emotional stress through deep breathing.

steps.title: Child's Pose (Balasana)
steps.instructions: Kneel on the floor, bring big toes together, knees apart. Sit back on heels and stretch arms forward, forehead resting on mat or cushion.

steps.title: Calming Breath
steps.instructions: Inhale deeply through nose for 4 counts, exhale through nose for 6 counts. Feel the breath press into your thighs. Repeat.

steps.title: Seated Forward Fold (Paschimottanasana Prep)
steps.instructions: Sit with legs extended forward, spine long. Inhale and reach arms up, exhale and fold from hips toward your shins or feet.

steps.title: Release Breath
steps.instructions: Inhale and lengthen spine, exhale and fold slightly deeper. Gentle and controlled movement with each breath.
